channel.title: Explicity-rs | Brand new Instant Pk Server with Economy!
channel.description:
Explicity-rs - More then a rsps | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk!|
The server is an instant pk server. This does not mean you will be able to go on with all the great Chaotic weapons etc right away.
The eco is based on Player Vs Player Skills. The more Kills you get, The more ingame material is released for you. You will gain custom titles, Epic weapons and more!
Build your reputation today!
Features: Amazing combat system - Perfection for hybrids! Many items spawnable with a sexy Spawn Set menu! All working Spiritshield effects Curses with working deflect prayers - pvm/pvp Multi freezing, Barrage orb on none freeze. A pk point shop, making you want to gain points! No dupes Working Report system - Every report are read instantly
Pictures?
[img]http://i.imgflip.com/a9wg.gif[/img]
[img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/9517/pkpointstore.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/8884/orbsi.jpg[/img]
So what are you waiting for? Join the community Today!
[size=24pt][b]Webclient[/b][/size] http://explicity-rs.webs.com/
As players join, i will update domain + New forums!
[size=24pt][b]Desktop client:[/b][/size] http://uppit.com/rjt09dil3kxx/Explicity_Official_client.rar
Welcome on board!
